item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: http://spondan.com/test1.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

Manohar International Private Limited (MIPL)

We are involved in manufacturing, supplying and exporting Processed Food, Solar Electrical Products & Engineering Material.

MIPL, one of the worlds most trusted brands, is a name with a long history that powers itself into new ventures. This trust extends to a series of products, services and solutions that cover diverse businesses - from consumer care to cutting-edge information technology.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
INTRODUCTION

MIPL - Manohar International Pvt. Ltd is a company bounded only by our capabilities, not by specific industries or product lines. MIPL constantly seek to grow our existing businesses, and build or acquire assets or businesses throughout the world that will allow us to create the greatest value.

PROFILE

Established in the year 2007, we, “MIPL - Manohar International Private Limited”, are involved in manufacturing, supplying and exporting of various industry based products. The products that we offer are precision engineered by the experienced professionals, who possess an immense knowledge and experience in their respective fields. Our range, if properly used, helps in minimizing the load on conventional energy resources. Due to its high efficiency, easy installation and energy conservation attributes, our range is appreciated in both domestic as well as international markets.

MIPL, one of the worlds most trusted brands, is a name with a long history that powers itself into new ventures. This trust extends to a series of products, services and solutions that cover diverse businesses - from consumer care to cutting-edge information technology. Over the years, our identity has evolved with our business, adapting to changing global dynamics.

In this fast changing world, MIPL believes it can leverage on its institutionalized innovation culture to push the boundaries for delivering solutions that provide enhanced value and direct impact for our customers.

MIPL is engaged in a continuous endeavor to maximize the realization of potential in its employees and market opportunities by synergizing the multiple ventures of the Group; thus creating an optimum business model that benefits both, stakeholders and society.

MIPL is a business behemoth based in India having a global footprint with interests in Infrastructure, Power, Global Trading, Logistics, Energy, Agro Business, Real Estate Development etc. It is a name well established among the distinguished corporate entities of India, with a young and highly motivated taskforce of professionals who are a prized asset of the organization.Our mentor, 'Mr. Dipak Sudhir Manohar', has always guided us in all our business operations and hence, we have been able to achieve the set organizational targets. Owing to his visionary guidance and extensive industry experience, we have been able to gain clients across the world.

item.title: Our Team
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
MR. DIPAK SUDHIR MANOHAR

Mr. Dipak Sudhir Manohar is the founder of the MIPL - Manohar International Private Limited. He is Masters of Commerce and Bachelors of Law with specialization in Cost Accounting. He was earlier associated with Adani Exports Ltd - One of India's most Diversified Group in Export. He is also co-founder of iiiEM - International Institute of Import & Export Management - One of India's Leading Export Import Institute in India.

MR. SHAILESH PATEL

Mr. Shailesh Patel is Heading Industrial Packaging Division. He is an MBA from Gujarat University and Having In depth Knowledge of Packaging Industry. He has also completed Diploma in Import and Export Management from iiiEM.

 

MR. RONAK PAREKH

Mr.Ronak Parekh is Heading Surgical Product Division. He is an MBA from Australia and Having Specialization in Export and Import Management.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing! Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Post three
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded: MIPL, one of the worlds most trusted brands, is a name with a long history that powers itself into new ventures. This trust extends to a series of products, services and solutions that cover diverse businesses - from consumer care to cutting-edge information technology.

item.title: Drum Locking Ring
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
We Manufacture all shapes, sizes of industrial drum locking ring & Clamps for UN(Liquids and Solids) and NON-UN drums as well as a range of other applications.
Closing Rings diameters range from 60mm to 2000mm, in metal from 0.5mm to 2.5mm thick. we also offer a wide range of different section profiles and are happy to develop new shapes with our customers.
These can be manufactures in iron-zinc, galvanized or stainless steel and can also be powder coated Include, Deburring edges, overlaps radius cuts safety edges etc.
For Exceptional Strength, each ring is the product of welded steel construction.

item.title: Drum Locking Clamps
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded: We Make Different Types Of Clamps For All Type Of Industrial Requirement Clamps Are With And Without Electrozinc Plated. We Produce And Supplies Any Special Design Clamp Suitable For Projection, Spot Welding Or Riveting. Standard of Locking clamp 1. International Design For A Worldwide Market 2. All Stamped Steel Construction 3. A Design Intended For Welding Onto The Ring. 4. A Low Profile That Makes It Easier To Palletize And Store Drums Closer Together. Technical Specification 1. Moc: GP and CRC Strip and SS .304 , 316. 2. Thickness: 0.8 mm to 1.5 mm 3. Range Available: From 3 “ to 8 “ long in various types 4. Used: Metal Drum , Fibre drums and Plastic Drum Locking Rings.

item.title: Drum Accessories
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded: We Make Different Types of Drum Accessories For All Type Of Industrial Requirement of drum With And Without Electrozinc Plated. We Produce And Supplies Any Special Design Suitable For Projection, Spot Welding Or Riveting. We are providing various kinds of Drum Accessories.

item.title: Cap Seals
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
We at Manohar International an ISO 9001-2008 Company are pleased in introducing ourselves as a leading manufactures of Capseals of 2", 3/4", 1", 3", 4", 7", 72 mm, 75mm, 80mm, & 85mm and Capsealing Machine for Sealing of M.S. and HDPE Drums and Barrels...

Catagory of Cap seals

  1. Plain Cap Seal: 2", 3/4", 1", 3", 4", 7", 72 mm, 75mm, 80mm, & 85mm
  2. Printed cap seal: 2", 3/4", 1", 3", 4", 7", 72 mm, 75mm, 80mm, & 85mm

item.title: Drum Closures

item.content:encoded:
we have recently start the manufacturing of exporting drum closure. we are providing various kinds of drum closure which mention at below
1. Drum closure without Gasket 2. Drum closure with EPDM gasket & Vitton Gasket 3. Steel Plated drum closure 4. Stainless steel drum closure 5. Steel lacquer Drum Closure

item.title: PE Paper cup
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Use: Beverage  
Material: Paper in 190GSM-320GSM
Style: Single wall PE coated
Type: Cup
Place of Origin: Gujarat, India
Colour: As per requirement
Packing Details: As per export standard packing
Delivery Detail: As per client’s requirement

Specification
Our paper cups made from 100% food grade PE coated paper. As per requirment, we
provide Paper cup coated on single side or double side.

Material : High-quality PE coated food grade Paperboard.
Type : Single wall and Double wall
PE:15 PE Coated
Color:White base paper or other as per requirement
Printing :Offset and flexo
Use: Beverage, Tea, Coffee and other hot and cold beverages

item.content:encoded:

Type: Cup
Place of Origin: India

item.title: Specialty Paper cups
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
1. Food grade 100% PE coated Virgin paper.
2. Flexo Printing with food-grade ink
3. High quality control system.
4. All paper cups can be customized with a variety paper weight
5. Customized logo and design is acceptable

Quality:

1. Quality and safe materials
Our products contain no smell. Through a careful selection process, we use only 100% food-grade paper materials and flexo print with environmentally friendly ink. It does not contain any toxic substances such as fluorescent, whitening agents.

2. Step quality control system good quality and durable
All products a durable and made to the highest quality. With a straight and wide cup body, it prevents leakages, sustains high temperatures, and lasts longer.

Range in Specialty Paper Cups:

  • PE Paper cup
  • Single wall paper cup
  • Double wall paper cup
  • Paper cup with Handle

item.title: Aluminium Foils
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Manufacturer, Supplier and Exporter of Aluminium Foils.

Quick Details:
Temper: Soft
Use: Food
Treatment: Other
Type: Roll
Alloy: 8011, 1235
Thickness: 0.006mm-0.2mm
Place of Origin: Gujarat India
It Can be customize.Packaging Details:

  • Packed in cardboard carton.
  • For export, the reels are packed in wooden crate/box.
  • Relevant markings are provided in each outer package.

Payment Terms:
Advance,L/C,D/P,T/T

Product Details:
Our range comprises Aluminium Poly Foil that is appreciated throughout this line of work
for excellent strength.

This product is widely used as a pure food grade aluminium foil in the food & beverage,
pharmaceutical and packaging sectors. We hold expertise in customizing the foil in terms of
thickness and offer the standard and customized product to the clients at the most
competitive prices. Some notable features of this foil available with us are as follows:

  • High strength
  • Pure food grade aluminum foils.
  • One side laminated with poly.
  • Durable.

item.title: Blister foil
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Manufacturer, Supplier and Exporter of Aluminium Foils.

Quick Details:
Temper:Hard
Use: Pharmaceutical
Treatment: Printed and Non-Printed
Type: Roll
Alloy: AA-8011
Thickness: 0.02mm, 0.025mm, 0.030mm
Place of Origin: Gujarat, India.
It Can be customize.

Packaging:
1. Foil reels are packed in cardboard carton
2. Reels are wrapped with LDPE film and packed with corners and foam side protectors
3. Jumbo reels are packed in wooden box in suspended condition with necessary poly film
wrapping, corners and foam side protectors.

Marking:
Order no., batch no., gross & net wt. and any other details as agreed mutually with
customer.

Payment Terms:
Advance,L/C,D/P,T/T

Product Details:
We offer Blister Pack, which is an essential packing material in the pharmaceutical industry.

This product is printed in accordance with the text, layout and shade of the product is
printed after client’s approval. If the customer opts for non-printed specification, clear
lacquer is used as a coating material for optimum protection and good printability. The
printing inks we use can easily bear temperatures up to 160º C for 1 second dwell time.

item.title: Strip foil
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Manufacturer, Supplier and Exporter of Aluminium Foils.

Quick Details:
Temper: Soft
Use: Pharmaceutical
Treatment: Printed and Non-Printed
Type: Roll
Alloy: AA-8011
Thickness: 0.025mm, 0.030mm, 0.040mm
Place of Origin: Gujarat, India.
It Can be customize.

Packaging:
1. Pharma foil reels are packed in cardboard carton
2. Reels are wrapped with LDPE film and packed with corners and foam side protectors
3. Jumbo reels are packed in wooden box in suspended condition with necessary poly film
wrapping, corners and foam side protectors.

Marking:
Order no., batch no., gross & net wt. and any other details as agreed mutually with
customer.

Payment Terms:
Advance,L/C,D/P,T/T

Product Details:
Our Strip Pack for pharmaceutical packaging is developed from fully soft (0 temper)
aluminum of alloy grade AA-8011, which adheres to the standards set by Aluminum
Association, USA.

item.title: Alu Alu Foil
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Manufacturer, Supplier and Exporter of Aluminium Foils.

Quick Details:
Structure of Alu-Alu Foil: 25 micron OPA Film /Adhesive / 50 micron Aluminium foil / 60 micron PVC film.
Temper: Soft
Use: Pharmaceutical
Treatment: Coated
Type: Roll
Alloy: 8011
Thickness: 145 micron
Place of Origin: Gujarat, India.
It Can be customize.

Packaging:
1. Pharma foil reels are packed in cardboard carton
2. Reels are wrapped with LDPE film and packed with corners and foam side protectors
3. Jumbo reels are packed in wooden box in suspended condition with necessary poly film
wrapping, corners and foam side protectors.

Identification:
Each reel is identified with a ticket having reel no., specification, mfg. date and number of
joints.

Marking:
Order no., batch no., gross & net wt. and any other details as agreed mutually with
customer.

Payment Terms:
Advance,L/C,D/P,T/T

Product Details:
We offer Alu Alu Foil. It is an excellent multilayered structure designed for high sensitive
range of pharmaceutical and generic medicines which are highly hygroscopic or light
sensitive and cannot be suitably packed with barrier plastic films and made up of good raw
materials. Our entire collection of packing aluminum foils and products are developed by
experts who have the required knowledge of specific requirements of our global buyers.

item.title: Aluminium Paper Foil
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Manufacturer, Supplier and Exporter of Aluminium Foils.

Quick Details:
Product: Aluminium Paper Foil
Temper: Soft
Use: Food/ Pharmaceutical
Treatment: Coated
Type: Roll
Alloy: 8011
Thickness: 0.009-0.020mm
Place of Origin: Gujarat, India.
It Can be customize.Packaging Details:

  • Packed in cardboard carton.
  • For export, the reels are packed in wooden crate/box.
  • Relevant markings are provided in each outer package.

Payment Terms:
Advance,L/C,D/P,T/T

Product Details:
We offer printed Aluminium Paper Foil thickness of paper with VMCH coating. These are
extensively used for packaging in pharmaceutical & food industries.

We also offer printed Alu Paper Foil which are made from Glassine, Kraft, Chomo and other
paper with poly laminates. Which are extensively used in pharmaceutical & food industries.

We also offer tailor made specifications as per customer's requirement.

item.title: Household foil
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Manufacturer, Supplier and Exporter of Aluminium Foils.

Quick Details:
Temper: Soft
Use: Food
Treatment: Composited
Type: Roll
Alloy: 8011, 1235
Thickness: 0.006mm-0.02mm
Place of Origin: Gujarat, India.
It Can be customize.

Packaging:
Products are packed and labeled according to the regulations and customer's requests.
Great care is taken to avoid any damage which might otherwise be caused during storage
or transportation. In addition, clear labels are tagged on the outside of the packages for
easy identification of the product I.D. and quality information﻿.﻿

Payment Terms:
Advance,L/C,D/P,T/T

Product Details:
Household aluminum foil's unique qualities make it a highly useful product in everyday life. From cooking to freezing, aluminum foil wrap has been a staple for commercial kitchens and consumers for decades.

item.title: Foil Lined Bags
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Manufacturer, Supplier and Exporter of Aluminium Foils.

Quick Details:
Material: Aluminium foil Paper
Temper: Soft
Use: Food
Treatment: Printed / Non-Printed
Type: bag
Alloy: 8011
Thickness: 6-8 micron
Size: 310 mm height x 180 mm width plus gusset of 55mm
Place of Origin: Gujarat, India.
Size can be customized.Packaging:

  • 500 bags packed in loose plastic pouch.
  • Relevant markings are provided in each outer package.

Payment Terms:
Advance,L/C,D/P,T/T

Product Details:
A foil Lined paper bag ideal for retaining the freshness and heat of cooked food, perfect for
take away use.

They are of very high quality and can be used for a whole array of things, such as garlic
bread, crispy duck, naan breads, toasted sandwiched etc to keep food warm.

item.title: Lidding Foil
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Manufacturer, Supplier and Exporter of Aluminium Foils.

Temper: Soft
Use: Food
Treatment: Coated
Type: Roll & Die Cut Piece
Alloy: 8011, 1235
Thickness: 30-40 micron
Place of Origin: Gujarat, India
It Can be customize.Packaging:

  • Packed in cardboard carton.
  • For export, the reels are packed in wooden crate/box..
  • Relevant markings are provided in each outer package.

IDENTIFICATION
Each reel is identified with a ticket having reel number, specification, operator number
and manufacturing date.

TEST CERTIFICATES:
Test certificates giving the actual observed values of different parameters would
accompany the supplies.

Payment Terms:
Advance, L/C, D/P, T/T

Product Details:
We have a range of  LIDDING FOIL, suitable for sealing to PP (Polypropylene), PS
(Polystyrene), PVC (Polyvinyl Chloride), PET (Polyethyleneterphthalate), PE (Polyethylene)
and HDPE (High Density Polyethylene) jars/cups/tubs substrates with the following general
specification. The final product specifications are made as per agreed contract with the
customers.

item.title: Laminates
item.dc:creator: ajanta
item.content:encoded:
Manufacturer, Supplier and Exporter of Aluminium Foils.

Quick Details:
Material: PE ( With or without Foil )
Industrial Use: Food and Pharmaceutical
Feature: Moisture Proof
Sealing & Handle: Heat Seal
Type: Roll
Temper: Soft
Place of Origin: Gujarat, India
It Can be customize.Packaging:

  • Packed in cardboard carton.
  • For export, the reels are packed in wooden crate/box..
  • Relevant markings are provided in each outer package.

Payment Terms:
Advance, L/C, D/P, T/T

Product Details:
We are manufacturers and suppliers of food packaging foils & pharmaceutical packaging
materials in India. The company offers total packaging solutions for all varieties of food
items and pharmaceutical adopting different material construction.

We offer high quality rotogravure printing upto 8-9 colours. Our printed laminates, are asthetically pleasing and combine attractiveness with functionality. The material
combination can be single/two/three layer as per the product characteristics and the
desried shelf life of the product.Laminates act as self promotion for the product
as it provides good pop at the time of purchase.

This product is widely used as a pure hairdressing grade aluminium foil in the hairdressers

[url* website id:website class:form-control placeholder "Website"]
[number contact-number min:0 max:9 id:contactNumber class:form-control placeholder "Contact Number"]
[text subject id:subject class:form-control placeholder "Subject"]
[textarea* message id:yourmessage class:form-control placeholder "Message"]
[submit class:contact_submit "Send"]
